title: Harrowing Skins 2014???
body:
Hello beautiful people out there,
is anyone able to tell me, if there are any already released skins for Halloween 2014,
preferably officially by a RIOT employer.

Have a nice day! <3

replies.body:
there aren't any 2014 halloween skins out currently but on the pbe there are 2 they are ravenborn{{champion:7}}  and underworld{{champion:62}} 

link: http://www.surrenderat20.net/2014/10/103-pbe-update.html#more

I miss when harrowing skins were a tongue and cheek costume for the character dressing up as something related to Halloween
New skins are just...Shadow Isle skins
i feel you i miss the costume skins QQ unfortunately i never bought any of them

I too miss the silly costume skins that came with the Harrowing. These serious skins are just meh for me but other people might like it, I guess? It's a shame that we'd have to wait at most a year for Riot to see before they even think about making silly skins again.
yeah i want some more silly costumes!

Nothing's been released just yet. As stated in the 4.18 patch notes, Ravenborn LeBlanc and Underworld Wukong will be released at some point during this patch! (I don't have the actual date, so hang tight!) :]

> Nothing's been released just yet. As stated in the 4.18 patch notes, Ravenborn LeBlanc and Underworld Wukong will be released at some point during this patch! (I don't have the actual date, so hang tight!) :]

What about Reaper Soraka? It's a Harrowing skin also, I'm sure? Right?
No. It's not. It's part of patch 4.19 where as the other two were part of 4.18
Not done on the PBE yet, so probably next patch.

Hey, does anyone know if the previous Halloween theme skins will be available I gifted my fiancee 3 skins before, and I really want to tie it all up with a Harrowing skin he said he wanted, and he expected the Sewn Chaos {{champion:61}} skin, but he didn't expect Debonair {{champion:254}}, and Little Knight {{champion:32}} .
He was taken off guard and I was so happy to hear he was smiling bright after getting the {{champion:254}}, and {{champion:32}} skins but I want to really really get him a Harrowing skin he's been asking for so.
I can only hope that all the previous Halloween-themed skins become released for the limited time this Halloween and soon, I've checked every day for if they become released this Halloween, and I can only hope it's really soon if they are released for this Halloween.
Please, I hope it {{summoner:6}} 's here fast.
It seems that the Harrowing gets pushed further and further back every year. What's with that? I want my {{champion:62}} skin right MEOW.
